about_the_game:
Defend the Metal Queen Dungeon! Adventurers have set out on a heroic quest to raid your very existence. Assemble your evil army by customizing your deck with powerful minion and spell cards. Show those wannabe heroes that in your dungeon, the prison cells stay empty and the riffs are heavy!

Features
  • Survive relentless waves of heroes, each wave more challenging than the last.
  • Build an evil army by playing cards onto a grid-based battlefield.
  • Play powerful minion, structure and spell cards from five different factions.
  • Take control over the battle with manipulation, destruction and movement spells.
  • Customize your deck by adding game changing cards of different rarities or burning those that don’t fit your strategy.
  • Utilize the stacking mechanic to strategically accumulate minions on a single tile.
  • Conquer the Classic Mode against a legendary hero or test your limits in Endless Mode.
  • Enjoy an original soundtrack ranging from doomy orchestral music to absolut face melting metal riffage!
